Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition: Testosterone \Tes*tos"ter*one\ (t[e^]s*t[o^]s"t[~e]r*[=o]n), n. [testes + o + sterone a steroid ketone.] a steroid hormone ({C19H28O2}) produced mostly in the testes, which is responsible for producing the secondary sexual characteristics of males. [PJC]
testosterone n : a potent androgenic hormone produced chiefly by the testes; responsible for the development of male secondary sex characteristics
